plot: In life we are guided by all sorts of Operating Instructions & Users' Manuals. But no one tells you what to do if you wake up on a mortuary table, waiting for your own autopsy. Now Mr. Anghel is ready to find out.
title: Cronica unei morti amanate
plot_es: In life we are guided by all sorts of Operating Instructions & Users' Manuals. But no one tells you what to do if you wake up on a mortuary table, waiting for your own autopsy. Now Mr. Anghel is ready to find out.
plot_en: In life we are guided by all sorts of Operating Instructions & Users' Manuals. But no one tells you what to do if you wake up on a mortuary table, waiting for your own autopsy. Now Mr. Anghel is ready to find out.
